alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 11:52PM MST until January 23 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches above 5500 ft, with 1 to 3 inches below 5500 ft. Amounts up to 8 inches over the highest mountain peaks. * WHERE...Areas near Alpine, Forest Lakes, Heber-Overgaard, Payson, Pine-Strawberry, Pinetop-Lakeside, Show Low and Whiteriver. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute Monday. Additional snow forecast from 11 PM Today to 11 PM Monday: Alpine 3 to 5 inches Forest Lakes 4 to 8 inches Heber-Overgaard 2 to 4 inches Payson 1 to 3 inches Pine-Strawberry 2 to 4 inches Pinetop-Lkside 4 to 8 inches Show Low 3 to 5 inches Whiteriver 2 to 4 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County; White Mountains
